thumb.title: Rapier tutorial with Template [How to make props]
thumb.description: How to build a rapier and a sheath. ========================================== ◆Please support me by donation If my tutorials helps you, please support me. You can donate me with credit cards or PayPal etc. I'm gonna use donation to make new props, thanks. http://www.gyakuyoga.com/donate2.html ========================================== ◆Templates download ◆More detailed info ◆Material list ◆Cautions in work https://www.gyakuyoga.com/buki/buki-kenr-reipia-ken_En.html https://www.gyakuyoga.com/buki/buki-kenr-reipia-saya_En.html Materials are EVA foam, glue gun, metalic stick etc. (If you can't get EVA foam, substitute wood or cardboard.) ========================================== ◆X(Twitter) https://twitter.com/gyakuyoga ◆My site http://www.gyakuyoga.com/ My site has many tutorials and templates.
thumb.user_nickname: ギャクヨガ@コスプレイヤー
